bibl.title: The Muslim Conquest of Egypt Reconsidered.
bibl.note: Introduction. - A brief note on ambiguities in Ethiopic. - Futūḥ Miṣr and Futūḥ al-Bahnasā. - The battle for Middle Egypt. - The advent of 'Amr ibn al-'Āṣ. - Conquest and collaboration. - Remapping the conquest of Egypt. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Phil Booth, The Muslim Conquest of Egypt Reconsidered.
Constantin Zuckerman (ed.), Constructing the Seventh Century = TravMém 17 (2013) pp. 639-670, 1 carte.

Introduction. - A brief note on ambiguities in Ethiopic. - Futūḥ Miṣr and Futūḥ al-Bahnasā. - The battle for Middle Egypt. - The advent of 'Amr ibn al-'Āṣ. - Conquest and collaboration. - Remapping the conquest of Egypt. - Conclusion.
